app_name: Gamers GLTool Free with Game Turbo & Game Tuner
app_detail:
Developer of PUB Gfx+ Tool presenting another most advanced GFX optimizer tool

This app is developed for testing game graphics and benchmarking game performance at different settings. It is useful tool for the game developers. This app will tweak your game graphics configuration.

Features of this app:
ğŸ‘‰ Auto Gaming Mode:Automatically configures all the settings of Game Turbo & Game Tuner.

Game Turbo
ğŸ‘‰ CPU & GPU Boost: Drastically improves your gaming performance.
ğŸ‘‰ RAM & SD Card Booster:Boost system RAM which will result in the smoother game play.
ğŸ‘‰ System Performance Tuner:Monitors the system performance, check for system stability and fixes various issue

Game Tuner
ğŸ‘‰ 1080 Resolution: Change the resolution of the game.âœ”ï¸
ğŸ‘‰ HDR Game Graphic: Unlock the HDR graphics on low end devices.âœ”ï¸
ğŸ‘‰ Extreme FPS: Unlock the Extreme FPS level. âœ”ï¸
ğŸ‘‰ Shadow:.Enable and disable shadow.âœ”ï¸
ğŸ‘‰ 4xMSAA: Enable and disable Anti Aliasing.âœ”ï¸
ğŸ‘‰ Style: Change graphics style setting.âœ”ï¸
ğŸ‘‰ Shadow Quality: Select the shadow quality.âœ”ï¸
ğŸ‘‰ MSAA Level: Select the MSAA Level.âœ”ï¸
ğŸ‘‰ Anisotropy Level: Select the Anisotropic filtering(AF) level.âœ”ï¸
ğŸ‘‰ Extra Effects: Enable/disable extra effects like light effect etc in game.âœ”ï¸
Zero Lag Mode: Optimized game configuration with Performance & Battery saver.âœ”ï¸
ğŸ‘‰ Potato Graphics: Minimal texture quality. Useful if your game lags.âœ”ï¸
ğŸ‘‰ Hardware-Accelerated Rendering: Enable support for VULKAN and OPENGL 3.1+.âœ”ï¸
ğŸ‘‰ Graphics Rendering Level: Enhance the quality of graphics.âœ”ï¸
ğŸ‘‰ Color Rendering Level: Enable 32 Bit / 64 Bit colors.âœ”ï¸
ğŸ‘‰ GPU Optimization: Custom OpenGL shaders.âœ”ï¸

Ping Booster*PRO
ğŸ‘‰ Ping Booster : Optimize your ping by speeding.
ğŸ‘‰ Ping Speed Test : Find the real time ping speed test..

ğŸ‘‰ Best settings*PRO : Now you can apply the graphics settings of high end devices (like Pixel 3/S10/OnePlus 7 pro/Poco/Note 9/Razer/Xperia XZ3/Moto Z2/OppoF9/Vivo NEX etc) on your device. Simply, Look for your favourite settings and import it.

Other Features 
ğŸ‘‰ Gaming Settings: System wide settings.âœ”ï¸.
ğŸ‘‰ Quick Boost: Boost you game.âœ”ï¸.
ğŸ‘‰ Quick Launch: Quickly launch your game.âœ”ï¸
ğŸ‘‰ Smart widget: Show off you app stats & launch game again.âœ”ï¸

Permission : Storage (Photos/Media files) for modifying graphics settings.
Permission : Internet for loading settings from our server.
Permission : Kill background app for boosting memory.


DISCLAIMER: Before using this app Please make sure that you have read & accepted out Privacy policy & Terms of service. 

Privacy Policy: https://www.trilokiainc.com/progamers-privacy.html
Terms of Service: https://www.trilokiainc.com/tou.html

* Free version has limited features.
* Free version contains ads.

All trademarked names and images are only used as references and we do not intend to violate or take ownership of these names and images..
